title: Create FO-02 server actions with batch generation
description:
Create app/fo-02/actions.ts with generateAffirmationBatchFO02():
- Accept: name, intention, batchNumber, approvedAffirmations, skippedAffirmations, implementation
- Use prompt_initial for batch 1, prompt_with_feedback for batches 2-3
- Combine approved+skipped into allPreviousAffirmations for deduplication
- Render template with feedback context
- Parse response with parseAffirmationResponse (import from fo-01 or shared util)

See SPEC.md section 'Server Action Changes' for signature.
acceptance_criteria: Server action compiles, handles all 3 batch scenarios
